parameters.name: autoconvert
parameters.description: ontuse replacement settings from account's API Auto Replace settings page fulltall non GSM 03.38 characters will be replaced with suitable alternatives. offtmessage content is not modified in any way.

parameters.name: dlr-url
parameters.description: URL where automatic Delivery Request is made.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Optional parameter that sets Sender. When not set, default Sender is used. Sender must be encoded in UTF-8

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: API account security key (API key) from the Messente's web page

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: All characters (Unicode) and long messages are supported

parameters.name: time_to_send
parameters.description: Optional parameter for sending message at some specific time in the future. Must be numeric Unix timestamp i.e. 1415253378. If time_to_send is set in past, message will be sent with no delays.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Receiver's phone number with country code

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: API account user name from the Messente's web page

properties.description: Keywords assigned by the articleu2019s author

1.description: Flag to designate u201ctimelessu201d articles, always topically relevant

3.description: Earliest date article can be published (default sort)

5.description: Date the article was last updated

6.description: Type of content embodied by the article

7.description: Phase of exporting that a business should be in to benefit from the article

8.description: Industry category assigned to this article

11.description: Trade region covered by an articleu2019s content

12.description: World region covered by an articleu2019s content

13.description: Would sub-region covered by an articleu2019s content

14.description: Country covered by an articleu2019s content

15.description: Keywords assigned by the articleu2019s author
